meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Scrophularia, especially S. nodosa, having small greenish flowers.
meanings.sent1: The figworts in the garden are known for their small green flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw some figworts growing by the stream.
meanings.sent3: The figworts decided to have a party and invited all the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The figworts stood out in the garden like tiny green lanterns.
meanings.sent5: The figworts swayed gently in the breeze, their green blooms shining in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the genus Scrophularia.
meanings.sent1: Have you ever seen figworts growing wild in the forest?
meanings.sent2: The herbalist collected various figworts for their medicinal properties.
meanings.sent3: The figworts whispered secrets to the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: In the field of flowers, the figworts were like hidden gems waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The figworts added a touch of green to the landscape, blending beautifully with the surroundings.
